testcase.name: Undefined step causes failure
testcase.system-out: Context: a step that isnt implemented yet...................................undefined

testcase.name: Steps before undefined steps are executed
testcase.system-out: Context: an implemented step................................................passed Action: a step that isnt implemented yet....................................undefined

testcase.name: Steps after undefined steps are skipped
testcase.system-out: Context: a step that isnt implemented yet...................................undefined Outcome: a step that we expect to be skipped................................skipped
